data.text:
Senior SharePoint & Power Apps Consultant at Interlink Computer Sciences in Detroit, MI

Our ideal candidate is passionate about helping organizations leverage the value of the M365 Platform including SharePoint, Teams, Power BI, Power Automate, and the Power Platform. Interlink is searching for someone to join our collaboration practice who will work with our clients to learn and document business needs and use that knowledge to implement portals, workflows, and collaboration experiences that create business value. Interlink Advantage:

We are the premier Microsoft Cloud consulting company based in Cincinnati, OH. We have been recognized by Microsoft as their top partner in the states of Ohio, Kentucky, Michigan, and Tennessee. Our main objective is coaching corporations to migrate successfully to the Microsoft Cloud. The technologies we focus on selling and supporting are Office 365, Azure, Teams, Voice, Systems Management, Windows 10, EMS Security Suite, Power BI, SQL Server, and managed services. We are a team of trusted experts who know how to navigate Microsoft's technologies, funding, and licensing. Interlink guides and educates clients, so they avoid overspending on licensing and unnecessary technologies. We work in a fast-paced, lively environment. As a company, we have been recognized as the Best Places to Work and as one of the fastest-growing firms in the region. The Senior SharePoint Consultant has key roles and responsibilities including:

Understanding and documenting business and technical requirements Executing projects to design and implement business solutions leveraging SharePoint, Teams, Power Automate, and PowerApps and third-party integrations Coordinating project delivery with project managers, other team members, and client resources Providing pre-sales support to assist with developing project scopes and approaches Providing guidance and mentoring to other team members Requirements Skills/Requirements:

The Microsoft 365 collaboration platform spans many technologies. Interlink does not expect that each resource will have deep experience in each technology listed. Backgrounds that include a focus area while understanding the usage of other technologies and a willingness to learn will be considered. Deep experience (5

years) designing and implementing SharePoint based portal, collaboration, and workflow solutions Real-world experience in object-oriented coding and logic principals Experience with other Office 365-based collaboration tools, such as Teams, Power BI, Power Automate, Power Apps, and Viva Familiarity with developing workflows and user interfaces via the Power Platform Experience with common third-party SharePoint tools, including forms and automation tools, migration tools, disaster recovery tools, administration tools, and solution accelerators Familiarity with branding and graphical design principles Knowledge of peripheral technologies, including Active Directory, security and compliance, and authentication (online and on-premises) Strong presentation skills, both prepared and impromptu Big-picture thinking and independent problem-solving skills Ability to communicate effectively with multiple audiences, including business leadership, technical leadership, and technical engineers Active industry certifications are preferred but not required Why Interlink:

We believe working in an innovative, fun, and collaborative environment is key to success. Interlink offers the flexibility of a small company, yet we can also offer the stability and benefits of an enterprise firm. We work with a family first attitude, so we look to hire motivated individuals who understand that it's important to get work done but to also have fun. As a team, we typically plan one team event per month that may include sporting events, happy hours, comedy clubs, or team-building exercises. We owe our success to our talented, dedicated team and we know the importance of teamwork.

Salary Range:

$80K -- $100K

Minimum Qualification

Software Development, IT ConsultingEstimated Salary: $20 to $28 per hour based on qualifications.

ID#: 1073881532

Location: Detroit, MI, 48201, USA

Type: Other

Company: Interlink Computer Sciences
